channel.title: [non-renamed] Make client go to login on loadup
channel.description:
[size=20pt]DONT JUST LEECH, COMMENT PLEASE[/size]
Basically what this will do, is instead of the player needing to press "Login" then type in the username and pass and such. It will automatically being up the username and pass page. Completely making the first page obsolite.
First, in client.java, find: [code] public int anInt833; [/code]
Make it look like this: [code] public int anInt833 = 2; [/code]
Now, still in client.java find: [code] anInt833 = 0; [/code]
Replace [b]ALL[/b] of those with: [code] anInt833 = 2; [/code]
Now find: [code] if (anInt833 == 0) { [/code]
Place this after that line: [code] anInt833 = 2; [/code]
There you go, simple and easy. Most clients dont have this and to me its annoying. There you go.

item.title: [non-renamed] Make client go to login on loadup
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[size=20pt]DONT JUST LEECH, COMMENT PLEASE[/size]

Basically what this will do, is instead of the player needing to press “Login” then type in the username and pass and such. It will automatically being up the username and pass page. Completely making the first page obsolite.

First, in client.java, find:

public int anInt833;

Make it look like this:

public int anInt833 = 2;

Now, still in client.java find:

anInt833 = 0;

Replace ALL of those with:

anInt833 = 2;

Now find:

if (anInt833 == 0) {

Place this after that line:

anInt833 = 2;

There you go, simple and easy. Most clients dont have this and to me its annoying. There you go.
